Posts.Content: Nov 11, 2015 06:23AM Edge20638 wrote: Hi I too was newly diagnosed November 4th. I understand how you feel. I as informed I have IDC but the stage was not provided. I am confused and overwhelmed. I am visiting three hospitals within the next week to determine which is the best for me. I was always a healthy person and no bc history in my family. I m researching to the point of a headache to try to hold on to some type of control. This is going to be my hardest fight I know it but I have to push through it
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed and feeling out of control demarie Moderators
